## Scripts

Automate the boring stuff

### [spotlight](./posts/spotlight)

Search, preview, copy paths, drag and drop, open files on your system  
Needs:
[fzf](https://github.com/junegunn/fzf),
[ripgrep](https://github.com/BurntSushi/ripgrep),
[xdragon](https://github.com/mwh/dragon),
[csview](https://github.com/wfxr/csview),
[eza](https://eza.rocks/),
[bat](https://github.com/sharkdp/bat),
[kitty](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/)

[{{< fa brands github size=2x >}}](https://github.com/jamespeapen/dotfiles/blob/master/bin/spotlight)

### [vimmy](./posts/vimmy)

Launch a temporary vim buffer, then auto type the input into a non-vim text
input  
Needs:
[neovim](https://neovim.io/),
[xdotool](https://github.com/jordansissel/xdotool)

[{{< fa brands github size=2x >}}](https://github.com/jamespeapen/dotfiles/blob/master/bin/vimmy)

### noaa-wallpaper

Set the latest GEOS full disk image as wallpaper  
Needs:
[imagemagik](https://imagemagick.org/),
[feh](https://feh.finalrewind.org/)

[{{< fa brands github size=2x >}}](https://github.com/jamespeapen/dotfiles/blob/master/bin/noaa)

### journal

Query DOI, NCBI API to get journal information
Needs:
[jq](https://jqlang.org/),
[yg-go](https://mikefarah.gitbook.io/yq/)

[{{< fa brands github size=2x >}}](https://github.com/jamespeapen/dotfiles/blob/master/bin/journal)
